document.full_text: a judge said that the court has received two letters written by tucson mass shooting suspect jared loughner, although the contents of the letters will only be made available to his attorneys.
document.title: court receives letters from tucson shooting suspect
lines_and_colors: a judge said that the court has received two letters written by tucson mass shooting suspect jared loughner, although the contents of the letters will only be made available to his attorneys.
